name: This Is (NOT!) A Car Club - Chapter 1, Scene 1
name_original: This Is (NOT!) A Car Club - Chapter 1, Scene 1
description:
You are a hamster, and you're just about to get adopted by a new family. A strange family... or actually it's a car club and not a family at all. And all members in it are stupid. Now it's up to you to save the world!

CONTROLS:

WASD = drive
Left mouse click = go through dialogue

Disclaimer

This is the first part of a coming game, and not a whole game.

This Is (NOT!) A Car Club is written in 100% Javascript and HTML and uses the library three.js to render 3D graphics and the library Ascend! to create its world.

by kbrecordzz & 2 Gåsfjädrar
